words: Hacker Training Network¡ªthe world¡¯s largest hacker training base£¡ Member homepage Course Introduction FAQ payment method lifetime membership member sign in Contact Customer Service Online Earning All-round Project Training Course ¦ò Software and game plug-in shelling and cracking class (reverse engineering) ¦ò Large-scale network security technology training class¦ò A crash course in DDoS attacks and defense ¦ò Special training course on software virus disguise VC++ software programming special learning class¦ò Delphi Advanced Business Software Programming Training Course¦ò Python language software programming training course course (simple and easy to learn) ¦ò VB large-scale software programming learning example class ¦ò JAVA high-end programming R&D employment training class Linux Network Embedded Architecture Engineer Training Course ¦ò Windows Server 2022 Server Network Engineer Training Course ¦ò ASP language website construction training course ¦ò Website and Server Hacking and Penetration Training Courses Employment guidance class for PHP large-scale website development engineers ¦ò ASP.net website development project practical training course¦ò Comprehensive mobile phone hacking attack and defense course ¦ò A crash course in password cracking Lifetime all-round VIP membership (all training) ¦ò Bronze VIP member (three training sessions) ¦ò Silver VIP member (five training sessions) ¦ò Gold VIP member (ten training items) There are only three steps to join a VIP member: 1. Select a VIP member training course 2. Pay Bitcoin online, take a screenshot of the voucher and contact the customer service email shadowhacker@tuta.io 3. Open a VIP member account and receive formal comprehensive training Ten Questions and Answers about Becoming a Member 1.Question: Why should you join the shadow hacker group? ¡¡Answer: The Shadow Hacker Organization is a well-established network security training site with rich training experience and technical standards. If you are eager to learn network security technology, or hope to have a skill and become a computer master that is envied by everyone, you can join Our VIP members. 2.Question: What can I learn by becoming a member? ¡¡Answer: Joining Shadow Hacker membership allows you to conduct systematic training and learning. Avoid detours, save time, and improve your skills as soon as possible. After completing the course, you can independently create your own website, have your own tools, have a certain understanding of hacking security techniques, and use hacking techniques to make money. We have different business and stable customer resources every day. As long as the technology is good enough, we can make money every day, Making thousands to tens of thousands of dollars every day is not a dream!. 3.Question: I don¡¯t know anything and have no foundation at all. Is it okay? ¡¡Answer: As long as you can surf the Internet and type, you can learn. We have prepared a set of the most basic courses for new members. If you do not have any basic membership, it is recommended to become a lifelong member and learn everything from scratch. 4.Question: My educational level is not high and I only have junior high school level. Can I study? ¡¡Answer: Of course, computer technology does not depend on the educational level of the household. Bill Gates became the richest man after dropping out of college. The president of Kingsoft did not start a business until he was 33 and learned programming. So as long as you are interested, you can definitely learn. Nothing is unachievable. 5.Question: Can I learn English if I don¡¯t understand it? ¡¡Answer: Basic English is used in programming, but as the saying goes, practice makes perfect. If you read the codes every day and memorize them, it will be like shopping for groceries every day. You don¡¯t need to look at the names of the dishes to know the approximate prices, so In fact, it has nothing to do with you having no foundation before. 6.Question: If I have a question that I don¡¯t understand, can I ask a question and give an answer? ¡¡Answer: We use dedicated VIP groups, VIP forums and VIP mailboxes, as well as VIP-specific remote control that penetrates the intranet. If you don¡¯t understand something, you can ask questions in the above ways, and we will answer them as soon as possible. Answers will be given to members within a certain period of time. 7.Question: How can I prevent money transfers from being defrauded in the future? ¡¡Answer: Although online transactions are not as visual as reality, they are also recommended by many people for their simplicity, convenience, and speed. As a network security training site, we will not joke about our reputation, and we will not do it for just a few hundred dollars. Losing essential credibility will not last long and will be despised by others. 8.Question: Do you only accept Bitcoin or Monero for payment? Answer:Yes, we only accept Bitcoinor Monero as a Payment methods and transaction process. We know and understand that many people have never used or even heard about it. For this reason, we've written a guide where we explain step by step how to use and pay with bitcoin. You don't need to have any special skills to use bitcoin. Anybody can do it. All you have to do is read our guide and follow our instructions, and you'll have no problem paying for our services with bitcoin. Just click on the image: Bitcoin is the best way to pay because it is anonymous (a bitcoin wallet is not subject to any name or ID), the transfer costs are practically zero, the money arrives almost immediately and is available all over the world. 9.Question: After transferring money, how do you confirm that it is me who has transferred the money? ¡¡Answer: We will determine whether your transfer is based on the time and amount of Bitcoin you transferred. Or contact customer service shadowhacker@tuta.io immediately after the transfer for verification. You can rest assured! 10.Question: Can I join you and take business after completing my studies? Answer: Of course, this is also the original intention of our hacker training, because we have a steady stream of hacker business from all over the world every day, and we lack enough manpower. We look forward to you becoming a formal member of Shadow Hacker Group, let us join hands with the Internet to get rich together. 10 questions and answers from members 1. Question: What is the first step after becoming a VIP member? ¡¡Answer: Check the member area password/member email Whether the account name is logged in normally, and you are familiar with the operation and management of the member Q&A system. 2. Question: How to study after becoming a VIP member? Answer:(1) Download the courseware recorded by the lecturer¡¯s voice and video, and then follow the tutorial¡¡¡¡ (2) Summarize your own experiences and organize them into your own learning log¡¡¡¡ (3) Study the content learned in depth and analyze the essence and key points of the lecturer¡¯s lectures 3. Question: How to apply for a member email account? ¡¡Answer: Your member username is your member mailbox, and the password is also the same. 4. Question: How should I ask if I have questions? ¡¡Answer: If you encounter any questions, you can ask them through the Q&A system in the member area in a timely manner, and the lecturer will reply to you in time with a detailed answer. 5. Question: What are the characteristics of your VIP members? ¡¡A: Shadow Hacker Group is the number one cybersecurity portal and the largest technical training website. Authoritative, formal and professional training concept, taking every member seriously and responsibly. 6.Question: Can I take all your classes? ¡¡Answer: You need to join a lifetime membership to learn all courses, including network security, online money making, software programming, website development and other technologies, so that you can become a comprehensive master. 7. Question: How can I upgrade to a lifetime membership? ¡¡Answer: You can directly add a lifetime membership to your existing membership. Lifetime membership includes all the courses of ordinary members. 8. Question: What should I do if I can¡¯t learn because I don¡¯t have the foundation? ¡¡Answer: The reason that you can¡¯t understand may be because your foundation is too poor. At this time, you should first choose to study the junior class courses. You can try to listen to the class and learn all the junior class courses at the same time. Once you are familiar with the beginner class courses, you will be able to understand the teacher¡¯s lectures! The instructor's courses are all hands-on teaching from basic to in-depth. 9. Question: What are the differences between the beginner, intermediate and advanced classes of the course? ¡¡Answer: The lecturer's course will be divided into three parts. The first 1/3 of the course is for the beginner class, the middle 1/3 is for the intermediate class, and the last 1/3 is for the advanced class. The course is a step-by-step learning plan from easy to deep. 10. Question: I have studied all classes, what should I study next? ¡¡Answer: If you have studied all the courses, you will have become a top expert and a network elite. On this basis, you need to start focusing on your favorite aspects, such as programming development, network security, etc. Find the aspects that interest you most, continue to study in depth, and consider your own career and life plans. Introduction to Hacker Technology Training Since Shadow Hacker was founded in 2007, it has excellent technical strength and strong teaching staff. It has trained thousands of hacker security technology enthusiasts and has won unanimous praise from everyone. 1/3 of its VIP members are voluntary old members. Spontaneously introduced. This is thanks to the support of many friends. It also encourages us and strengthens our determination to bring more and better resources and learning materials to every friend who supports, cares and understands us.It also strengthens our goal of developing a formalized hacker security technology exchange and training website. In order to enrich everyone's learning materials, this website specially cooperates with the world's top experts. The lecturers on this website are top industry experts. All courses are through Carefully arranged and easy to understand. Starting from the basics, everyone can gradually move towards the ranks of masters in a short period of time through systematic training, rich learning materials and full guidance from teachers. @ 2007-2024 Shadow Hacker

There are only three steps to join a VIP member: 1. Select a VIP member training course 2. Pay Bitcoin online, take a screenshot of the voucher and contact the customer service email shadowhacker@tuta.io 3. Open a VIP member account and receive formal comprehensive training
Ten Questions and Answers about Becoming a Member
1.Question: Why should you join the shadow hacker group?
¡¡Answer: The Shadow Hacker Organization is a well-established network security training site with rich training experience and technical standards. If you are eager to learn network security technology, or hope to have a skill and become a computer master that is envied by everyone, you can join Our VIP members.
2.Question: What can I learn by becoming a member?
¡¡Answer: Joining Shadow Hacker membership allows you to conduct systematic training and learning. Avoid detours, save time, and improve your skills as soon as possible. After completing the course, you can independently create your own website, have your own tools, have a certain understanding of hacking security techniques, and use hacking techniques to make money. We have different business and stable customer resources every day. As long as the technology is good enough, we can make money every day, Making thousands to tens of thousands of dollars every day is not a dream!.
3.Question: I don¡¯t know anything and have no foundation at all. Is it okay?
¡¡Answer: As long as you can surf the Internet and type, you can learn. We have prepared a set of the most basic courses for new members. If you do not have any basic membership, it is recommended to become a lifelong member and learn everything from scratch.
4.Question: My educational level is not high and I only have junior high school level. Can I study?
¡¡Answer: Of course, computer technology does not depend on the educational level of the household. Bill Gates became the richest man after dropping out of college. The president of Kingsoft did not start a business until he was 33 and learned programming. So as long as you are interested, you can definitely learn. Nothing is unachievable.
5.Question: Can I learn English if I don¡¯t understand it?
¡¡Answer: Basic English is used in programming, but as the saying goes, practice makes perfect. If you read the codes every day and memorize them, it will be like shopping for groceries every day. You don¡¯t need to look at the names of the dishes to know the approximate prices, so In fact, it has nothing to do with you having no foundation before.
6.Question: If I have a question that I don¡¯t understand, can I ask a question and give an answer?
¡¡Answer: We use dedicated VIP groups, VIP forums and VIP mailboxes, as well as VIP-specific remote control that penetrates the intranet. If you don¡¯t understand something, you can ask questions in the above ways, and we will answer them as soon as possible. Answers will be given to members within a certain period of time.
7.Question: How can I prevent money transfers from being defrauded in the future?
¡¡Answer: Although online transactions are not as visual as reality, they are also recommended by many people for their simplicity, convenience, and speed. As a network security training site, we will not joke about our reputation, and we will not do it for just a few hundred dollars. Losing essential credibility will not last long and will be despised by others.
8.Question: Do you only accept Bitcoin or Monero for payment?
Answer:Yes, we only accept Bitcoinor Monero as a Payment methods and transaction process. We know and understand that many people have never used or even heard about it. For this reason, we've written a guide where we explain step by step how to use and pay with bitcoin. You don't need to have any special skills to use bitcoin. Anybody can do it. All you have to do is read our guide and follow our instructions, and you'll have no problem paying for our services with bitcoin. Just click on the image:

Bitcoin is the best way to pay because it is anonymous (a bitcoin wallet is not subject to any name or ID), the transfer costs are practically zero, the money arrives almost immediately and is available all over the world.

9.Question: After transferring money, how do you confirm that it is me who has transferred the money?
¡¡Answer: We will determine whether your transfer is based on the time and amount of Bitcoin you transferred. Or contact customer service shadowhacker@tuta.io immediately after the transfer for verification. You can rest assured!
10.Question: Can I join you and take business after completing my studies?
Answer: Of course, this is also the original intention of our hacker training, because we have a steady stream of hacker business from all over the world every day, and we lack enough manpower. We look forward to you becoming a formal member of Shadow Hacker Group, let us join hands with the Internet to get rich together.


10 questions and answers from members

1. Question: What is the first step after becoming a VIP member?
¡¡Answer: Check the member area password/member email Whether the account name is logged in normally, and you are familiar with the operation and management of the member Q&A system.
2. Question: How to study after becoming a VIP member?
Answer:(1) Download the courseware recorded by the lecturer¡¯s voice and video, and then follow the tutorial
¡¡¡¡ (2) Summarize your own experiences and organize them into your own learning log
¡¡¡¡ (3) Study the content learned in depth and analyze the essence and key points of the lecturer¡¯s lectures
3. Question: How to apply for a member email account?
¡¡Answer: Your member username is your member mailbox, and the password is also the same.
4. Question: How should I ask if I have questions?
¡¡Answer: If you encounter any questions, you can ask them through the Q&A system in the member area in a timely manner, and the lecturer will reply to you in time with a detailed answer.
5. Question: What are the characteristics of your VIP members?
¡¡A: Shadow Hacker Group is the number one cybersecurity portal and the largest technical training website. Authoritative, formal and professional training concept, taking every member seriously and responsibly.
6.Question: Can I take all your classes?
¡¡Answer: You need to join a lifetime membership to learn all courses, including network security, online money making, software programming, website development and other technologies, so that you can become a comprehensive master.
7. Question: How can I upgrade to a lifetime membership?
¡¡Answer: You can directly add a lifetime membership to your existing membership. Lifetime membership includes all the courses of ordinary members.
8. Question: What should I do if I can¡¯t learn because I don¡¯t have the foundation?
¡¡Answer: The reason that you can¡¯t understand may be because your foundation is too poor. At this time, you should first choose to study the junior class courses. You can try to listen to the class and learn all the junior class courses at the same time. Once you are familiar with the beginner class courses, you will be able to understand the teacher¡¯s lectures! The instructor's courses are all hands-on teaching from basic to in-depth.
9. Question: What are the differences between the beginner, intermediate and advanced classes of the course?
¡¡Answer: The lecturer's course will be divided into three parts. The first 1/3 of the course is for the beginner class, the middle 1/3 is for the intermediate class, and the last 1/3 is for the advanced class. The course is a step-by-step learning plan from easy to deep.
10. Question: I have studied all classes, what should I study next?
¡¡Answer: If you have studied all the courses, you will have become a top expert and a network elite. On this basis, you need to start focusing on your favorite aspects, such as programming development, network security, etc. Find the aspects that interest you most, continue to study in depth, and consider your own career and life plans.

Introduction to Hacker Technology Training

Since Shadow Hacker was founded in 2007, it has excellent technical strength and strong teaching staff. It has trained thousands of hacker security technology enthusiasts and has won unanimous praise from everyone. 1/3 of its VIP members are voluntary old members. Spontaneously introduced. This is thanks to the support of many friends. It also encourages us and strengthens our determination to bring more and better resources and learning materials to every friend who supports, cares and understands us.It also strengthens our goal of developing a formalized hacker security technology exchange and training website. In order to enrich everyone's learning materials, this website specially cooperates with the world's top experts. The lecturers on this website are top industry experts. All courses are through Carefully arranged and easy to understand. Starting from the basics, everyone can gradually move towards the ranks of masters in a short period of time through systematic training, rich learning materials and full guidance from teachers.
